head.title: Ann Arbor Blue (For All University of Michigan Fans)

directions.step:
Liquefy in blender:
Phillip Graebing wrote that he had lost his blueberry recipes. I have a cookbook called "The Blueberry Connection" - 209 pages of nothing but blueberry recipes. Being it's that time of the year, hopefully some of the following will refresh Phillip's files
Serve about 1/3 blueberry blend with 1/3 white wine and 1/3 crushed ice. Top with sprig of mint.
"It is said that the Indians used the blueberry as an anti-spasmodic to ease the pain of childbirth. This remedy was later adopted by many of the early settlers."
